com.leanplum

Interface LeanplumUIEditor

  • Deprecated. 
    LeanplumUIEditor will be made private in future releases, since it is not intended to be public API.

    @Deprecated
public interface LeanplumUIEditor
    Describes the API of the visual editor package.
